WRITING.TEXT: If miller's world has so much gravity that it distorts time so much, how can they all even stand?

Teamviewer. Free remote desktop connection, and they have a mobile app, so you can control your pc from your phone. I spent a lot of money on building a nice desktop, and just remote to it from a cheap netbook or my android phone whenever I need it. Teamviewer is probably the most important free software I've ever used! The app has come a long way, I find the interface extremely logical and easy to use, you can also transfer files and it's just the best.

WRITING.TEXT: Maybe you bumped into them on a plane. Or maybe you went to college with them before they made it big. Proof gets mad ups.
